citations.narrative:
The bottom of two posts in the exterior of the exercise yard for pen 2, building 1, had damaged metal flashing with sharp
edges extending from the ground @8 inches high and 6-8 inches in length. Sharp metal edges may be an injury hazard.
The facility must ensure that the enclosures contain animals safely.
Correct by November 7, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The bottom of two posts in the exterior of the exercise yard for pen 2, building 1, had damaged metal flashing with sharp 
edges extending from the ground @8 inches high and 6-8 inches in length. Sharp metal edges may be an injury hazard. 
The facility must ensure that the enclosures contain animals safely.  
 
Correct by November 7, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
